channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Supernova Love
item.description: "Supernova Love" is a song by South Korean girl group Ive and French DJ David Guetta. It was released on November 8, 2024, by Virgin Records. The song was produced in collaboration with KDM Records' music platform The Collab X.
